com.adlibsoftware.elevate.integration

Class JobManagementServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adlibsoftware.elevate.integration.JobManagementServiceClient

  • public class JobManagementServiceClient
extends Object
    This is a helper class for API integrations to Adlib Elevate Job Management Web Service
    Author:
    mmanley

      • submitSynchronousJob

        public ProcessedJobResponse submitSynchronousJob(String repositoryName,
                                                 Payload inputPayload,
                                                 Duration timeout,
                                                 Duration pollingInterval,
                                                 boolean completeJob)
                                          throws Exception
        Submits a job Payload to Adlib, and only returns after job is completed
        Parameters:
        repositoryName -
        inputPayload -
        timeout -
        pollingInterval -
        completeJob - - Only set this to true if you do not need to copy files back from output Payload or they do not reference the Adlib Work folder (work folder is purged on Complete)
        Returns:
        ProcessedJobResponse
        Throws:
        Exception

      • streamSynchronousJob

                                                 Payload inputPayload,
                                                 Duration timeout,

                                                 boolean completeJob)
                                          throws Exception
        Submits a job Payload to Adlib and streams files in Payload, and only returns after job is completed
        Parameters:
        repositoryName -
        inputPayload -
        timeout -
        pollingInterval -
        completeJob - - Only set this to true if you do not need to copy files back from output Payload or they do not reference the Adlib Work folder (work folder is purged on Complete)
        Returns:
        ProcessedJobResponse
        Throws:
        Exception

      • streamJob

        public long streamJob(String repositoryName,
                      Payload inputPayload)
               throws Exception
        Submits the job via streaming and updates the Payload. Does not wait for completion of job.
        Parameters:
        repositoryName -
        inputPayload -
        timeout -
        pollingInterval -
        completeJob - - Only set this to true if you do not need to copy files back from output Payload or they do not reference the Adlib Work folder (work folder is purged on Complete)
        Returns:
        Job ID
        Throws:
        Exception

      • downloadFiles

        public void downloadFiles(ProcessedJobResponse processedJob,
                          File downloadDirectory,
                          DownloadFileNamingMode fileNamingMode)
                   throws Exception
        Downloads the files for the processed job (after calling streamJob and waitForJobToProcess)
        Parameters:
        processedJob -
        downloadDirectory - base directory to download to. If file names are not unique, indexed sub-folder will be created
        fileNamingMode - the naming convention to use when downloading files. Anything other than NONE requires that "OriginalFileName" JobFile metadata exists.
        Throws:
        Exception
